components.description: The letter K, which can be used as part of a regional indicator pair to create emoji flags for various countries.
components.title: Regional Indicator Symbol Letter K

components.description: The letter R, which can be used as part of a regional indicator pair to create emoji flags for various countries.
components.title: Regional Indicator Symbol Letter R

description: The flag for South Korea, which may show as the letters KR on some platforms.
title: Flag: South Korea

emoji_net_data.definition: The flag for South Korea, which may show as the lettersÂ KRÂ on some platforms. The Flag for South Korea emoji is a sequence of the ?? Regiona http://emojipedia.org/flag-for-south-korea/
emoji_net_data.name: South Korea

bn:13778626a: From or in the countryside or connected with it.
Of, from or pertaining to the countryside (adjective).

bn:00105648a: Of or relating to Corea, Coreans or the Corean language.
Of or relating to the Asian Peninsula comprising North Korea and South Korea.
Of or relating to or characteristic of Korea or its people or language

bn:00083289v: To signal (someone or something) with a waving movement.
Signal with the hands or nod
To signal with a waving movement.
To signal with the hands or nod.

bn:00088378v: Travel through the air; be airborne
To cause to travel through the air.
To cause to fly : to transport via air or the like.
To move autonomously through the air, without any part of the object or object's enclosure touching anything attached to the ground.

bn:00083885v: To cause to move back and forth repeatedly.
To move or swing back and forth.
Move or swing back and forth
To move or swing a weapon back and forth, particularly if demonstrating skill.

bn:02472949n: The Flag of South Korea, or Taegukgi is the national flag for the Republic of Korea.

bn:00034960n: Emblem usually consisting of a rectangular piece of cloth of distinctive design
A flag is a piece of fabric with a distinctive design that is used as a symbol, as a signaling device, or as decoration.
A piece of cloth, often decorated with an emblem, used as a visual signal or symbol.
Piece of fabric with a distinctive design

bn:00067224n: A republic in the southern half of the Korean Peninsula; established in 1948
In relation to Names of Korea
A country in East Asia, comprising the southern half of the Korean Peninsula. Official name: Republic of Korea.
South Korea, also known as the Republic of Korea, is a country located in eastern Eurasia, on the southern part of the Korean Peninsula. Korea
A country in East Asia, the southernmost of the two states born of the partition of Korea following the Korean War; commonly known as South Korea.
South Korea, officially the Republic of Korea, and commonly referred to as Korea, is a country in East Asia, constituting the southern part of the Korean Peninsula.
A geographic area, civilization, and former state situated on the Korean Peninsula in East Asia.
A country in East Asia whose capital is Seul.

bn:00023236n: The collective body of a nation or state as politically organized, or as exercising political functions.
The territory of a nation, especially an independent nation state or formerly independent nation; a political entity asserting ultimate authority over a geographical area.

Nations is often used synonymously with ethnic group, but although ethnicity is now one of the most important aspects of cultural or social identity for the members of most nations, people with the same ethnic origin may live in different nation-states and be treated as members of separate nations for that reason.
Political organisation with a centralized independent government
An organized political community, living under a government
Nation has various meanings, and the meaning has changed over time.
A state is an organized community living under one government.
A political entity asserting ultimate authority over a geographical area.

A people permanently occupying a fixed territory bound together by common law, habits and custom into one body politic exercising, through the medium of an organized government, independent sovereignty and control over all persons and things within its boundaries, unless or until authority is ceded to a federation or union of other states.
The people who live in a nation or country
A politically organized body of people under a single government
A state is a nonphysical juridical entity of the international legal system that is represented by one centralized government that has supreme independent authority over a geographic area.
The geographic area under the control of a political state.

note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
